name: libidinously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows or involves a lot of sexual activity or very strong sexual desire (= feeling of wanting something): Jarman established a distinctive style that was often visually arresting as well as libidinously charged. These goings-on were legal, but libidinously out of control. Synonym
lustfully
More examplesFewer examplesWitches were typically women, either old and ugly, or libidinously learned, and sometimes both. I have myself often felt libidinously seduced by Venice, as though it was a living creature, full of sweet passion.Though not as libidinously raucous, their second album evokes similar memories of that post-punk era.
